title: When will the CBSE conduct the board exam in 2021? - Quora

response.answer_text: Right now we can't assume anything regarding CBSE 2021 Exam because at current stage INDIA still fight against CORONA and we all know “we have a very bad situation in major cities like AHMEDABAD, MUMBAI, DELHI & many more cities”. But in 2021 may be exam will held on time because they already reduced the 30% syllabus so that they can cover it on time. You have to prepare for it but don't depend on particular exam date because if you are appearing 12th then you have to appear in JEE OR NEET. So you can continue with your preparation and if you want updates regarding CBSE exam and other info then you may visit TOPPR BLOG for all updates (syllabus, test series, exam date and all ). Even “Toppr : The Better Learning App” will help you to cover all syllabus through video lectures provided by them.
